author: sandygao
msg: Another bug was introduced when fixing 17885.
Can't reset the content of ValidatedInfo when validate is called, because
the normalizedValue will be used later.
So we should only clear the memberType field.

author: sandygao
msg: Fixing bug 17885: sometimes the member type definition in PSVI is not null
when the type definition is not a simple type with union variety.

author: sandygao
msg: Fixing bug 17412: ']' isn't a valid schema pattern regex value.
Many thanks to Khaled Noaman for the patch.

author: sandygao
msg: Improve some of the schema error messages, to make it easier to understand.

author: sandygao
msg: Implemented whatCanGoHere in the schema content models.
For now it's only used internally. If we ever want to expose such functionality,
we might want to revisit the method signature.
